segments.text: Excuse me , I've been waiting here for 10 minutes . Do you know how often does No . 636 run ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It runs every 15 minutes . You must have missed it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems you got here at good time . Do you have a bus schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . You can buy a bus schedule in a news stand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , thank you . By the way , is this the right bus for the Museum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . The Museum is the terminal of this bus .
segments.speaker: S2
